name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Developer with over 13 years of experience in building high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Advanced proficiency in **Java** and **Spring Boot**, enabling the design of robust and scalable systems. Skilled in **API First** development and implementing **gRPC** and **OpenAPI** specifications for seamless integration and communication.
Experienced in methodologies like **SCRUM** and **Clean Code**, committed to continuous improvement and collaborative work environments. Deep knowledge of microservices architecture, leveraging **Kafka** for real-time data processing and employing **Maven** for project management.
Additionally, possesses skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and has practical experience with frontend technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Well-versed in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, and proficient in CI/CD practices for rapid delivery and enhanced quality. Demonstrates a solid foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms, resulting in compelling predictive analytics and automation solutions.
